scripts.install:prod: concurrently --names 'page,decide,search' "cd team-page && npm install" "cd team-decide && npm install" "cd team-search && npm install"
scripts.install:dev: concurrently --names 'page,decide,search' "cd team-page && npm -D install" "cd team-decide && npm -D install" "cd team-search && npm -D install"
scripts.start: concurrently --names 'page,decide,search' "npm run team-page:prod" "npm run team-decide:prod" "npm run team-search:prod" "npm run open -- http://localhost:3000"
scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'page,decide,search' "npm run team-page:dev" "npm run team-decide:dev" "npm run team-search:dev" "npm run open -- http://localhost:3000"
